text:
The DATA_TYPE_NAME public field in the class
org.apache.tools.ant.types.Substitution has an error: its value is
`substitition', instead of `substitution'.  There is also the same error in the
Javadoc comment for the class.  I have put a patch at the following URL:

http://forge.happypacket.com/Substitution-typos.diff
creator: phrakt@gmail.com
peterreilly@apache.org
text: You are correct- fixed now, thanks!
